item.title: Deploying Docker Containers on Mac OS X using Kubernetes (K8s) - C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Looking to use, deploy & manage containers? Simon Gilbert explains how to setup, configure and deploy Docker containers with Kubernetes (K8s) locally using C# ASP.Net MVC Core
